summary: Multi-user EMR case tracking system with detailed ticket classification, task types, and time logging for healthcare support teams
architectural_notes: Backend built with Motoko canisters for on-chain data storage
Frontend using React + TypeScript with Tailwind CSS
Admin role with aggregated team statistics view
EMR-specific case tracking with healthcare support workflow fields
Time logging in IST format with automatic AM/PM detection
Comprehensive ticket lifecycle tracking from origin to resolution
known_issues: Mode toggle option is not functioning correctly
Case edit functionality fails to update cases after submission

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity authentication system allowing users to sign in with passkeys, Google, Apple, or Microsoft accounts
Build personal dashboard showing each user's own cases, active timers, and individual statistics with data isolation ensuring users only see their own data
Implement admin dashboard displaying team-wide metrics including total cases handled, team utilization rates, and average resolution times
Create live case tracking system with time conflict detection that alerts users when attempting to log overlapping case times
Build batch entry mode allowing users to log multiple cases at once with case type, start time, end time, and optional notes
Implement break management system with timer and visual overlay indicating when users are on break
Create analytics dashboard with utilization tracking, displaying charts for daily/weekly productivity, case distribution by type, and time allocation
Implement CSV export functionality allowing users to download their timesheet records with case details, times, and durations
Implement dark/light theme toggle with user preference persistence across sessions

Design and implement a cohesive visual theme with warm, energetic color palette (coral, amber, teal accents), clean sans-serif typography, and card-based layouts that emphasize productivity and clarity
Remove ProtectedRoute wrapper from all application routes so Dashboard, Batch Entry, Analytics, and Admin pages are accessible without Internet Identity authentication
Remove or hide LoginButton component from Layout header navigation since authentication is no longer required
Modify useActor hook to initialize backend actor without requiring Internet Identity authentication or delegation
Remove ProfileSetupModal requirement or make it optional since users can start tracking cases immediately without creating profiles
Add Agent Name text input field to case tracking form

Replace existing case type dropdown with Task Type dropdown containing 11 EMR-specific options: Support EMR Tickets, Break - 15, Break - 30, Client Meeting, Client Side Training, Internal Team Meeting, POD, Feedback/Review, Internal Training (Conducted by EQX), Training - New Team Member, Training Feedback - New Team Member
Add Case Classification section with Case Origin dropdown (Chat, Email, Voice Call) and EMR Case# text input field, displayed only when Task Type is 'Support EMR Tickets'
Add Case Type dropdown with three options (New, Followup, Reassigned) including helper text explaining when to use each option, displayed only when Task Type is 'Support EMR Tickets'
Add Assistance Needed dropdown with three options (No, Equinox, Onshore) including helper text explaining when to select each option, displayed only when Task Type is 'Support EMR Tickets'
Add Ticket Case Status dropdown with seven options (On-Hold, Pending, Resolved, Open, New, Escalated, Transferred) with helper text, displayed only when Task Type is 'Support EMR Tickets'

Add Escalation/Transfer Classification dropdown with three options (N/A, Transferred, Escalated) including helper text explaining when to use each option, displayed only when Task Type is 'Support EMR Tickets'

Add Escalation/Transfer Destination dropdown with 15 department options (CSM, Billing, PSA, Client Advocates, MAT, eRX, Lab, Sales, Accounting, EMR Support, Cleanup, CAS, Product Enhancement, CRM, PDMP), displayed only when Escalation/Transfer Classification is 'Escalated' or 'Transferred'
Modify time tracking inputs to use Task Start Time and Task End Time labels with IST timezone indicator, maintaining existing time input functionality and conflict detection
Update batch entry page to include all new EMR case classification fields with conditional visibility matching the live tracker form
Update case list display components to show agent name, task type, and key EMR classification details (case origin, case type, ticket status) when available
Update CSV export to include all new EMR tracking fields in exported data
Update analytics dashboard charts and statistics to group and visualize data by Task Type instead of the old case type field
Add utilization tracker that supports multi-tasking scenarios where agents work on multiple chats and emails simultaneously, allowing utilization percentages to exceed 100%
Enhance the frontend user interface design to improve visual appeal, layout clarity, and overall user experience across all pages
Add manual time entry fields allowing users to directly input start time and end time when creating or logging cases, instead of only using the live timer
Implement case editing functionality allowing users to modify previously logged cases, including all case details, times, and EMR classification fields

Add a live elapsed time display to the CaseTimerControls component that shows the running duration (formatted as HH:MM:SS) whenever a case timer is active, updating every second from the case start time until the Stop button is pressed
Replace current color scheme with dark navy blue background (#1a1f2e or similar) throughout the entire application
Update header navigation to display Mode toggle, Sync button, notification bell icon, and Reset button in the top-right corner with button styling matching the reference image
Style the Break button in the top-right corner with pink/magenta background and white text matching the reference image design
Redesign the progress cards (Shift Progress and Utilization) with gradient backgrounds, rounded corners, and icon badges as shown in the reference image
Update all form inputs (date, time, dropdowns, text fields) to use dark backgrounds with light text and borders matching the reference image styling
Style the Start, Break, and Stop buttons with green, purple, and red gradient backgrounds respectively, matching the reference image button design
Update the Save Record button to use purple/indigo background with white text and rounded corners matching the reference design
Redesign the recent cases list at the bottom of the dashboard to use dark card backgrounds with appropriate spacing and typography matching the reference image
Update typography throughout the application to match the reference image, using appropriate font weights and sizes for headers, labels, and body text
Ensure all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, dropdowns) have subtle hover and focus states that work well with the dark theme
Identify and remove the duplicate header component from the application UI, keeping only one header navigation element visible across all pages

Investigate and fix the Mode toggle button in the header navigation that is currently non-functional, ensuring it properly switches between manual and auto time entry modes in the CaseTimerControls component
Debug and fix the case edit functionality in EditCaseModal that is failing to update cases, ensuring edited case data is properly submitted to the backend and reflected in the case list

new_feature_requests.summary: Core EMR case tracking form with agent name and task type selection (Support EMR Tickets, Breaks, Meetings, Training, etc.)
EMR case classification fields: Case Origin (Chat/Email/Voice Call) and EMR Case# input
Case Type tracking (New/Followup/Reassigned) and Assistance Needed selection (No/Equinox/Onshore)
Ticket Status tracking (On-Hold/Pending/Resolved/Open/New/Escalated/Transferred) and Escalation/Transfer classification
Escalation/Transfer destination tracking (CSM/Billing/PSA/EMR Support/eRx/Lab/etc.) with automatic field population
Utilization time logging with Task Start Time and Task End Time in IST format
Update backend case data model to include new fields: agentName, taskType, caseOrigin, emrCaseNumber, caseType, assistanceNeeded, ticketStatus, escalationTransferType, escalationTransferDestination
Add utilization tracker supporting multi-tasking with >100% utilization (concurrent chats and emails)
Enhance frontend UI design and user experience
Add manual start and end time entry fields to case tracking form
Add case edit functionality to modify logged cases after submission
Add live timer display showing elapsed time when case work starts
Remove duplicate header from the application UI
